text.p: REUTERS EUROPEAN DIARY OF EVENTS FOR ADVERTISING & MEDIA - TO
March 2
The following is a one-week diary of events covering advertising, marketing, media and the Internet in Europe.
MONDAY, FEB 24
LONDON - Conference on telecoms industry, marketing strategies.
Contributions from BT, Global One, AT&T, Iridium. Kensington Hilton. (first day of two-day conference).
BRIGHTON, England - 1997 Newspaper Sales Conference, Stakis Brighton Metropole Hotel. Contact: (44) 171 636 7014 (second day
of three-day conference)*******************
TUESDAY, FEB 25
LONDON - Conference on telecoms industry, marketing strategies, Kensington Hilton. (Final day of two-day conference.).
BRIGHTON, England - 1997 Newspaper Sales Conference, Stakis Brighton Metropole Hotel. (final day of three-day conference)
LONDON - Scottish Television Plc reports 1996 full-year results.
LONDON - EMI Plc reports nine-month results.

LONDON - Financial Times New Media & Broadcasting Conference.
